title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 3.5 - President of the university
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 3.5 - President of the university

State Regulations

There shall continue to be a President of the University of
the State of New York, chosen by the Regents by ballot, who shall hold office
during the pleasure of the Regents, and such other officers as the Regents
shall from time to time designate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
3.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
